summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3821 for the improvement of West 62nd Street, from Sycamore Avenue to 3rd Avenue Northwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46956, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
